channel.title: Homepage on Robbert-Jan 't Hoen
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on Robbert-Jan 't Hoen

item.title: First blog post
item.author: robbertjan-1994@hotmail.com (Robbert-Jan 't Hoen)
item.description: And after a few days of troubleshooting, I have finally succeeded in launching my first website with Hugo, hurray! My current setup is GitHub Pages + Hugo + Blogdown as recommended in this excellent tutorial by Amber Thomas. This allows me to create rich web content by utilizing Rmarkdown files with the blogdown package in Rstudio. This smoothly integrates with my personal data analysis projects that are mainly done in the R statistical programming language.

item.title: First blog post
item.author: robbertjan-1994@hotmail.com (Robbert-Jan 't Hoen)
item.description: And let there be ligth! After a few days of troubleshooting, I have finally succeeded in launching my first website with Hugo, hurray! Website setup I will start this website off by giving a brief overview of my current setup and stating my inentions for the short-term. My current setup is GitHub Pages + Hugo + Blogdown as recommended in this excellent tutorial by Amber Thomas. This allows me to create rich web content by utilizing Rmarkdown files with the blogdown package in Rstudio.

item.title: About
item.author: robbertjan-1994@hotmail.com (Robbert-Jan 't Hoen)
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: About me
item.author: robbertjan-1994@hotmail.com (Robbert-Jan 't Hoen)
item.description: Introduction My motivation for building this website is threefold: To track my progress To later on remember me of past endeavours To motivate/inspire/help others Getting to know me I am Robbert-Jan â€™t Hoen, a 22 year old student living in the neighbourhood of Rotterdam, the Netherlands. I hold a bachelor in Econometrics and Operations Research, and am currently pursuing a master in Quantitative Finance. My interests are mainly concerned with mathematics, statistics, machine learning, renewable energy, healthcare, new technologies, and almost all sports.
